mission-money-leak-fix.instruction:
Fix the systemic monetary leaks identified in design/3_work_artifacts/reports/REPORT_MONEY_LEAK_AUDIT.md. Specifically: 1) Refactor DemographicManager.handle_inheritance to ensure zero rounding loss. 2) Implement atomic rollbacks in SettlementSystem.transfer to prevent money from vanishing during failed deposits. Document findings in communications/insights/mission-money-leak-fix.md.

mission-money-leak-fix.title: Fix Systemic Monetary Leaks (M2 Drift)

mission-code-blue-exec.instruction:
Implement the Code Blue economic fixes defined in design/3_work_artifacts/work_orders/WO-157_CODE_BLUE_IMPLEMENTATION.md. Add demand elasticity to AI-driven household purchasing and dynamic pricing (stale inventory discounts) to Firms. Ensure all logic maintains zero-sum integrity. Document insights in communications/insights/mission-code-blue-exec.md.
